entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as sitting around Mr. Weasley and having a conversation.

entities.name: mundungus fletcher
entities.description: A wizard who tried to put a hex on Harry Potter when he had his back turned.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A wizard who is having tea with Harry Potter and his friends.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of Mr. Weasley's sons, eager to know if he found anything.

entities.name: george
entities.description: Another one of Mr. Weasley's sons, asking a question about the shrinking door-keys.

entities.name: mortlake
entities.description: A wizard who was taken away for questioning about some extremely odd ferrets.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley and Harry Potter are having a conversation with each other.
Mundungus Fletcher tried to put a hex on Harry Potter.
Mr. Weasley is the parent of Fred.
Mr. Weasley is the parent of George.
Mortlake was involved in something with the Committee on Experimental Charms.
Mr. Weasley is related to the Committee on Experimental Charms through Mortlake's involvement.
